844180.name: Slab
844180.description:
Step into the world of Slab, an exhilarating arcade game inspired by the timeless classics Breakout and Arkanoid! Take control of your paddle and embark on a thrilling journey to shatter slabs and bricks across 50 challenging levels. If you cherish the joy of classic arcade games, Slab is your ultimate playground.

Gameplay Mechanics

In Slab, your mission is simple: destroy all the slabs and bricks in each level. Use your horizontally moving paddle to ricochet the ball, aiming to break every last brick. At the start, you have 3 hearts. Collect "Add Life" power-ups to increase your chances of survival, but beware of the "Instant Death" power-up that will cost you a life.
Experience a diverse array of custom bricks, each with unique breaking stages. Unleash a variety of power-ups to enhance your gameplay!

Features

Endless Fun: Enjoy over 2 hours of engaging gameplay across 50 uniquely designed levels.
Competitive Edge: Climb the leaderboards and showcase your skills.
Power-Up Frenzy: Utilize 15 different power-ups to turn the tide in your favor.
Stunning Visuals: Immerse yourself in colorful, fresh graphics that bring each level to life.
Achievements Galore: Unlock a plethora of achievements as you progress.
Precision Control: Experience the precision paddle, designed for accurate ball control.

Why Play Slab?
Relive the excitement of classic arcade gaming with a modern twist. Slab offers a perfect blend of nostalgia and innovation, providing an addictive and rewarding experience for players of all ages.

Download Slab now and start breaking those bricks!

Problem with the game

If you have a problem with the game, please let me know in Discussions.
